text: Hey guys, can we get some better copy for our signature ThingWeek event: <http://www.thingweekpdx.com/schedule/2015/5/23/hackathon-of-things>

attachments.title: Hackathon of Things
attachments.text: Learn about all of the different companies participating in the Hackathon of Things. Have a few beers with us as we get ready to hack #allthethings.

text: I’m sending folks here and I think we have copy somewhere that just hasn’t been updated
updated the site with the copy from the splash page. Let me know if it needs any more changes
<@U026NB2U2>: thanks for connecting us with jamaal! given his background and expertise, do you think it would be best for me or <@U02HCCTFL> to reach out to him?
also <@U02HCCTFL>: the flyer for thing week that <@U02F9CXTL> emailed yesterday—do you want there to be any mention of the pre-party on 5/22?
<@U04JZANJF>: it should be fine as is. the pre party is optional
regarding Jamaal - let’s have <@U02HCCTFL> respond, as I think he/Colliers may be a good sponsor for the afterparty
but let’s keep you in the thread, bc he might be a good volunteer observer for the hackathon

chiming in here - I took a stab at that blurb based on the updated web copy: "SmartThings, Uncorked Studios, and our partners invite hackers, designers, and product innovators to join us for an opening reception on the 22nd and a full day on 23rd to prototype products with purpose, utility, and value. "
<@U04JZANJF>: can you send the blurb over to liv? I'm slammed today

thingweek legal is all sorted thanks to <@U02918BKW>! one question remains: there is a section at the end of the t&cs that says "Questions about any Event can be submitted to [insert info email address.]." <@U02HCCTFL> should that be you? or should we set up an email alias for these questions and tackle as they come in?
go ahead and send them to me
